column4: hey I'm having a pain of a time trying to boot into the Ubutnu 12.04 live cd to get the install running
I've butnt it from ISO
verified the disk, and then even tested that it boots in a VM that's fine
but when I go to boot the actual cd on this machine it's screwed
it basically loads the screen with thelogo then goes to a black screen with a flashing "_"
and it sits and flashed FOARVARRRR
did u try other options from boot options?
I don't get that far
when u put the cd in the drive and boot the computer then hold down arrow key and it would give u options
what arrow key?
: keyboard down arrow key
ok I'll try that
what option is the best for this problem?
ok I got the menu - I'll try a few options here - thanks!
I've just tried about all of the options and it still won't boot into them
the test memory option works
and memory seems fine
all the others go to a flashing _
:  then I cant say much ... is ur cd drive and written data fine on disk?
yeah I checked that, I can boot into it by reading the physical disk into a virtual machine
over vmware
